overview_of_class: This is a year-long second-year Korean course for continuing students who finished Korean I or who have the equivalent proficiency. The course aims to further develop students' all-around communicative ability in speaking, reading, listening and writing to the Intermediate Mid level by the ACTFL guideline and to have students achieve the competency in the skills of Communication, Comparisons and Cultures in conjunction with the National Standards.
name: Korean II
subject: KOREAN
